an algorithm for locat adjac storag block in the buddisystem a simpl scheme for the determin of the locatof a block of storag rel to other block isdescrib thi scheme is applic to the buddi type storagalloc system cacm april 1975 hind j a dynam storagalloc buddi system gener fibonacci sequenc 3 89 4 324 39 ca750409 jb januari 9 1978 3 46 pm1389 4 2768 1552 4 2768 2162 4 2768 24354 2768 2596 4 2768 2596 4 2768 2747 42768 2768 4 2768 2768 4 2768 2845 4 27682845 4 2768 2902 4 2768 2902 4 2768 29114 2768 2955 4 2768 2955 4 2768 1184 52768 2435 5 2768 2768 5 2768 2768 5 27682768 5 2768 2845 5 2768 2902 5 2768 10516 2768 1062 6 2768 1184 6 2768 1184 62768 1211 6 2768 1552 6 2768 1879 6 27682435 6 2768 2435 6 2768 2596 6 2768 25986 2768 2734 6 2768 2736 6 2768 2747 62768 2747 6 2768 2768 6 2768 2768 6 2768
